author: taylor
msg: made WindowValidation optional in the WindowAccessor
the default is disabled, configured in spring-accessor.xml
since I was seeing 16 SQL statements per request being executed against
the ENTITY and PORTLET table per portlet
The actual number of SQL statements will vary depending on your layout and decorators
This test was run against the most minimal miminal layout

author: gozer
msg: - make dist tarballs can now be built directly into RPMs with rpmbuild
- Added a new target 'make rpm' to directly build rpms from a checkout

author: jm
msg: bugfix from prev commit: the ordering of -firsttrusted was being reversed, testing the LAST (least recent) untrusted relay instead of the FIRST (most recent).  fixed again
